ygData.subject: Allience
ygData.msgSnippet: Diamond:: Well,  I have a different story.  I was an assassin for the High Preddacon Council back on Cybertron.  I was under orders, looks down at her

Diamond::

"Well,  I have a different story.  I was an assassin for the High 
Preddacon Council back on Cybertron.  I was under orders, "looks down 
at her wrists.  "I killed a few lower ranking members on the Maximal 
caouncil. Then I was ordered to kill a high ranking maximal official, 
Quantis.  After that, the council used me more or less in house. I 
killed another bot and when the found out that I killed one bot 
outside of my orders,they turned me in for the murder of the 
maximal.  I got away and stole the shuttle.  I managed to wind up 
here." 




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> Still grinning, DevilDuer nods. "Not exactly a fleet, but two or 
> three, yeah. I pissed off this Predacon general, and he didn' 
> apreciate it. I managed to get a chip into one of the troops 
onboard 
> and they helped me out of the torture chambers, and t' a stasis 
pod. 
> B'for he knew it, I was nowhere onboard, and here on earth."
> 
> He glances at the screen, "Then Zardus recruited me, and here I am."
>
